name: mca-starter-kit
description: Mobile Chrome Apps Starter Kit is Yet Another Opinionated Boilerplate for Chrome Apps development

scripts.reset: cd src && rm -rf .tmp app bower_components docs node_modules platform/platforms platform/plugins platform/www/app *.* ..?* .[!.]*
scripts.setup: cd src && replace "\'dist" "'platform/www/app" gulpfile.js && cd platform && cca prepare && cordova-config set name "$npm_package_name" && cordova-config set id $npm_package_appId && cordova-config set desc "$npm_package_description" && cordova-config set author "$npm_package_author_name" "$npm_package_author_email" "$npm_package_author_url"
scripts.postinstall: got-psk src full@1.1.1 && cd src && npm install && npm install --save-dev cca-delegate gulp-util && bower install && gf-import ./bower_components/font-roboto/roboto.html --html=./bower_components/font-roboto/
